mapper.select: SELECT i.item_id, i.item_name, i.item_price, i.item_description, i.item_deleted, i.item_owner_id AS user_id, u.name AS user_name FROM items AS i LEFT JOIN users AS u ON i.item_owner_id = u.id LEFT JOIN user_departments AS ud ON u.user_department_id = ud.user_departments_id LEFT JOIN user_companies AS uc ON ud.user_company_id = uc.user_companies_id WHERE i.item_id= #{id} and uc.user_companies_id = #{companyId} and i.item_deleted = false

SELECT i.item_id, i.item_name, i.item_price, i.item_description, i.item_deleted, i.item_owner_id AS user_id, u.name AS user_name FROM items AS i LEFT JOIN users AS u ON i.item_owner_id = u.id LEFT JOIN user_departments AS ud ON u.user_department_id = ud.user_departments_id LEFT JOIN user_companies AS uc ON ud.user_company_id = uc.user_companies_id WHERE uc.user_companies_id = #{companyId} and i.item_deleted = false
mapper.update: UPDATE items SET item_name = #{name}, item_price = #{price}, item_description = #{description}, item_deleted = #{deleted}, item_owner_id = #{ownerId} WHERE item_id = #{id}
